subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Past winners like Lance Armstrong and Alberto Contador will face stiff competition from riders like Andy Schleck and Cadel Evans in cycling’s most famous race.
snippet: Past winners like Lance Armstrong and Alberto Contador will face stiff competition from riders like Andy Schleck and Cadel Evans in cycling’s most famous race.
